tool_description: Validates laboratory test results against clinical trial requirements, checking values against acceptable ranges and identifying potential safety concerns or eligibility issues.

lab_results.description: Array of lab test names with corresponding values

lab_values.description: Array of numeric lab result values corresponding to lab_results

reference_ranges.description: Standard or protocol-specific reference ranges for validation

test_date.description: Date when lab tests were performed

error_messages: Array length mismatch: lab_results, lab_values, and units (if provided) arrays must have the same length.
Invalid lab values: All lab_values must be numeric and non-negative.
Missing reference ranges: reference_ranges must specify valid ranges for all provided lab tests.
Invalid test date: test_date must be valid ISO 8601 format and not in the future.
Unrecognized lab test: One or more lab tests in lab_results are not recognized or supported.
usage: Provide patient_id, arrays of lab test names and values, reference ranges, and test date. Optionally include units for each measurement. The tool validates all results against specified ranges.

individual_results.description: Validation result for each lab test

abnormal_values.description: List of lab tests with values outside normal ranges

critical_values.description: Lab values requiring immediate clinical attention

eligibility_impact.description: Assessment of how lab results affect trial eligibility
